products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
products.description: White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space. Product id: db-rbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow nightingale blue roller blind in blue.

products.title: Meadow Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Beautiful botanicals in a graduating teal palette inspired by the changing skies and greek countryside, who wouldn't want that hanging at their window? This clarissa hulse design is a bouquet of wild flowers and leaves. products.title: Meadow Teal Roller Blind
products.description: Ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture. We're not sure what more you could ask for from a window dressing than this stunning meadow teal roller blind. There's wild clematis, quaking grass and wild oats from the greek countryside, in ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture.

products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The meadow nightingale electric roller blind is decorated with a white floral motif on blue and creates a contrasting effect that will look so striking in situ. The fabric is pollergen treated and can be raised and lowered with ease thanks to the electric remote control, making this blind such a convenient update to any family space. Product id: db-erbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow nightingale blue electric roller blind in blue.
